title: [NEW] Having issues Patching 6.7? Click Here!
body:
Hey all,

Given the much anticipated release of some new Mecha and Program skins, let us be the first in welcoming our new robotic overlords.  ALL HAIL THE CYLO--ROBOTS!

http://i.imgur.com/C0L3kOr.png

In case anyone is experiencing issues patching and therefore are not able to pay the proper respects, read the steps below which should help resolve any issue you have.  Otherwise, drop us a comment below and we'll respond and help out!

----------------------------------------------

> #***Files Scanned reaches over 9000!!!!! Or, 15k, 20k, etc***

The patcher needs to scan already installed files to make sure that none of the files are corrupt.  If it finds one, it replaces it and rescans the files.  This is why it can sometimes get as high as 20k, even though there aren't 20k files in the installation.  

**The best thing to do is let it scan files!**  If you restart the client, it may cause it to scan even more files.   The patcher will eventually stop scanning files, and it will patch normally afterward.

> #***Patcher never pops up, or disappears after you press "LAUNCH"***

This can be caused by corruption with the patcher itself or it failed to properly self-patch. Additionally, it may be due to some issues with the configuration of your computer system's permissions (meaning it can't properly save the files in the correct location). To resolve this, make sure to complete all the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)!

> #***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. Many of the most common Anti-virus programs [have already whitelisted LoL](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3), however make sure to update yours to the latest version!

Also, even though you may have set specific exceptions in place before for your security program, League of Legends has gone through a major update. Therefore, your security program may recognize the old version of League of Legends, but not the new version. 

To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

--------------------------------------------------------------

*If after completing these steps, and you still do not see the glorious orange 'LAUNCH' button, feel free to drop us a post in this thread!  Rioters as well as Wrenchmen volunteers will be on hand to respond and provide some additional help!*

replies.body: Hey when i launch my game and log in and when I get into the client the screen is black and I have this weird tip window but with no tip in it. I tried to repair my launcher but it didnt work. I will add a screenshot I hope you can help me. [](http://imgur.com/hZudbdl)

Sounds like the client is able to connect to our Servers. Try running through these[ login steps](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) and see if that fixes you up. If not reply back and we'll take a deeper look into the situation.
Same issue
same problem
same problem here
Yes please, I'm not the only one.

Hey when i launch my game it goes to the login screen everything is black  no login  no nothing

screenshot
https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=C6C4F031942A178E!7328&authkey=!AM1Pt8s0MTmX-Rc&v=3&ithint=photo%2cpng

It seems to be happening to everyone

I'm having a different problem entirely. It loads the patcher but when i put in my password to login its gives me the message that reads "Client version 6.6.16_03_24_18_32 is rejected by server." Can anyone tell me what to do or as to why this is happening? Is my only option to reinstall? {{item:3070}}
it's happening to me i uninstalled and installed it again did not work.

> [{quoted}](name=HobbleBobble123,realm=OCE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GAjhZ6rX,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2016-04-06T15:15:49.375+0000)

Can anyone tell me what to do or as to why this is happening? Is my only option to reinstall? {{item:3070}}

the same [roblem is happening to me, and i am frustrated beyond human comprehension. But im glad to see im not the only one, hopefully this gets fixed soon 


(pls Riot i need to releive some stress)

getting a message that says game failed to start. give the client a restart and buzz support.league... if this comes up again, i have restarted and can not reconnect to the games because it seems they never started in the first place
Hey Psycho0Babble! Could you take a screenshot of what you're seeing? I'll check it out and give you some more information about what's going on.

[](http://imgur.com/CKBbzdi)

I'm having this problem too
http://imgur.com/CKBbzdi

I have uninstalled and reinstalled the game 3 times already and this is as far as it gets

https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1133x709q90/924/1aWYuZ.png

After hitting retry it immediately jumps to 33% and begins scanning from 0 and just keeps scanning and scanning. I left my PC on for 2 days and all it did was scan and it didn't move from 33%. It is not my connection as I've updated everything I own that required and update without issue save for League. 

Please advise how to proceed as this is now just plain ridiculous. FIX THIS SO THAT I MAY GIVE YOU MY MONEY!!!!

Running on a Mac, I seem to have an issue every new patch until the second smaller patch comes around. I patched fine and even re patched and tried messing around with m y firewall and such. I am able to join pick and bans phase but after the game begins to load I get an error saying the game crashed. After every time I try to reconnect to the game I get the same thing asking me to reconnect. Ranked Does not work and neither does it work when I create a custom game. I was playing last night, and everything was fine before this patch. not sure why this happens most patches for me. Mac FTL?

Recap: Game crashes saying "Game Crash. The game has crashed. Please try to reconnect"
I have re booted computer, repaired and it still does not work in any game mode

Sounds like you're having a bit of a tough time, but I have something that should get you back in the game. Follow the steps in this [Crash KB](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#section-mac) and if it continues after going through the steps let me know.
i did read the article but mine is 33% and scanning files is it supposed to do that ?

Yep, don't worry! I know it can be frustrating to wait, but if it's scanning files then the best thing to do is let it keep going. It's making sure you have all the right files, that they are healthy, and noting what it needs to download for the update.

Let me know if you get stuck though!

Downloaded the latest patch ...

Essentially i open launcher ... Press the bright orange " Launch " Button ... Nothing happens 
No errors no nothing the actual in game Log in screen doesn't come up 

I can open an infinite amount of League of legends tabs ....  

I've ran the repair tool ...
I've done a clean install ..
I've disconnected and reconnected internet
I've restarted the computer ... is there something wrong with riot's servers right now ?


-{{champion:238}} Shot

i seem to have a problem, like everyone else, when i click "Launch" i am greeted with an empty space of my desktop, and when i click the patch again it loads everything nicely and when i click launch again nothing, the patches loaded up perfectly.

i have uninstalled, repaired any patch mistakes that might of happen, and no work, i will check if its firewall if it is, ill come back and update this.{{champion:37}}

I've been experiencing a lot of crashes with the client lately after patch 6.7. Usually it happens when I join a game. However when I log back in, I have to wait out  a 5 - 30 minute LeaverBuster (depending on the frequency of my crashes) for leaving the game and loose LP for unintentionally dodging. Anyone else having this issue?{{summoner:3}}

Hey there

The Low Priority Queue and LP penalty are part of the Leaverbuster that triggers even if the DC isn't intentional.

Usually if this is a recurring issue it might have something to do with a Connection issue that triggers when you try to get into SR. [Run through this KB](http://riot.com/12B7oac) and let me know what the results are, or if the problem happens again. :)

Hey I have run into an issue when getting into the game.   It will mimic if I was disconnected  with everything freezing and me being able to walk around. However i will have normal ping and FPS .  It will happen at random times and the time length of it will vary.  I will be much obliged if you can assists me .

I am having a really strange problem! I downloaded the patch and played two games, I tried for a third later on, but was unable to Launch because my files were apparently corrupted. Did a repair and downloaded everything, got into champ select, and could not enter the game no matter how many times I pressed Reconnect. Re-downloaded the WHOLE game, played one game fine, and now today I am getting the same corrupted file message... asking me to repair again... I don't understand what to do anymore lol

Since this seems to be a recurring issue I recommend [writing a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Tech. They might be able to provide further insight since repairs and reinstalls seem to only be temporary fixes. :)
Big thanks to Riot's support team for trying to help all these people.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Successfully updated, but when I tried to logged in, it didn't accept my 'server' as it thought I was still in the previous patch. Tried restarting League and it had to download the second time.

Please fix!
Thanks for the heads up on that! Just making sure, you were able to patch that second time though? Let me know if you're still having trouble with it, and I'd be happy to help!

No more trouble :) Works perfectly fine!

(Why am I feeling so special talking to a moderator xD) {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Glad to hear it's running smoothly, and I feel special being able to talk to you guys too! http://bit.ly/1RZTNyJ

I get an unspecified error when starting up the patcher; after searching, I found a rioter comment on reddit saying to delete the air client files from RADS/projects, but I can't due to it saying the files are corrupted. What should I do?
I did this, it didn't fix anything.

When I launch the patcher, all that I get is a plain white screen, the links and such are physically there, I just can't see them. I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling multiple times and nothing seems to fix it. This is on Mac. Hoping for a solution as this is pretty annoying.

http://imgur.com/8lsXqbS
relevant problem
I looked through the connection KB and none of it seems to apply to this problem in particular.
After downloading patch 6.7, I could click launch and input my login information. I would go to start the game and it said I was still on patch 6.6 so it rejected me. Any fixes?

It says the "Unspecified error occurred" and on top of that, a message pops up on my toolbar saying something about "The file or directory" blah blah then says "Characters\Fiora\Skins\Skin04 is corrupt and unreadable. Please run the Chkdsk utility." Why must {{champion:114}} betray me like this...
How far does the patcher get in percentage before you see the Unspecified Error pop up, if you remember? Then I can narrow it down a little further! :)
I've got a different issue... my league patcher is not showing the patch being installed, and the launch button is grayed out! Got a fix for this? :(

Everytime I log in I get a EULA BEFOREA I hit launch button (you can tell the button still up

I try everything but noting work at all

please I need help with

https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=991314147632001&set=a.139920602771364.28339.100002602750226&type=3&theater
after patching, i cant connect to PVP.net.I try another pc but its the same.I post it 3 days ago but no one answer.I dont know how busy you are but at least read it and fix it, will you?

Everytime I try to install/patch it downloads fine? it gets to 0.05mb and 0kbps then after I wait a little it gets to applying patches at about 40% and the percentage goes up until 70% 60%.. 54% it differs everytime and then it crashes and asks me to send an error report...
Does LoL 6.7 work for windows xp? It worked for me in the past...
Nevermind I followed the pk and I forced a repatch and it worked so quick. Thanks!
